backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, investments, transactions with session-based integrity tracking, and role-based access control using MixinAuthorization for ADMIN and INVESTOR roles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping five high-confidence features (runtime errors, authentication, backend communication, session state rendering, and build issues) to their implementation files and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, configuration files, and styling, describing their purpose and key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm amber/orange color palette using OKLCH color space for both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Investment Tracker application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow handling, conditional rendering for login/profile setup/dashboard, and Layout wrapper with Header/Footer.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard displaying user profile, statistics cards for investments/transactions/session buffer, Integrity & Session State section for INVESTOR users showing session hashes and latest SessionState, investment form, and recent investments grid.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on current hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header component displaying the app logo, user profile with role badge, and navigation buttons (Dashboard, Investments, Transactions) along with a login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentCard.t: Card component for displaying individual investment details with tabs for overview and transactions, showing total transaction amount, creation date, and a dialog to add new transactions.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentForm.t: Form component for creating new investments with name and description fields, generating unique IDs and handling submission with toast notifications.
Displays a grid of all investments in the platform with investment details including ID, investor principal, description, and creation date, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, manages session finalization for investors, and clears query cache on logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form displayed to new users, collecting name, email, and role (Admin/Investor) to initialize their user profile in the system.
Form for creating transactions with type selection (recharge, invest, withdraw, etc.), amount input, and automatic session initialization with unique IDs and nonces for each transaction.
Displays a scrollable list of transactions for a specific investment with icons, badges, and formatted details including type, amount, nonce, and session sequence. Shows empty state when no transactions exist.
frontend/src/components/TransactionsList: Renders a comprehensive table view of all caller transactions with detailed columns including type, IDs, amount, timestamp, transaction hash, nonce, and session sequence. Includes loading state and empty state with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token from URL params and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider component with login/logout functionality, identity management, and configurable AuthClient options including derivation origin support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including user profiles, investments, transactions, and session management with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a complete design system including light/dark theme colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements using oklch color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up the React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, font families (Inter, JetBrains Mono), container settings, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a fix request for frontend runtime errors, with features tracking investigation of authentication, actor initialization, and rendering issues.
